es.unileon.rnag.cubiga.operator

Interface FitnessOperator


  • public interface FitnessOperator
    Conains all needed operations to stop the genetic algorithm.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Javier de Pedro Lopez, Adrian Casimiro Alvarez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double fitnessFunction(Chromosome chromosome, GeneticAlgorithm algorithm)
      Calculates a value that represents the fitness of a chromosome.

    • Method Detail

      • fitnessFunction

        double fitnessFunction(Chromosome chromosome,
                     GeneticAlgorithm algorithm)
        Calculates a value that represents the fitness of a chromosome.
        Parameters:
        chromosome - the chromosome that must calculate the fitness.
        algorithm - the current genetic algorithm.
        Returns:
        The calculated fitness value for a chromosome.
